labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Tushare_Finance_Data" is primarily designed to provide real-time financial data access through the Tushare API integration. It offers a wide range of tools for fetching financial market data, including stock prices, market indices, company financials, macroeconomic indicators, and investment-related analytics. The server enables users to perform market analysis, access financial news, and gain insights into stock performance, making it a valuable resource for investors, analysts, and financial professionals.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Financial Services" was chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around providing financial data and tools that support investment analysis and decision-making. The secondary label "Data Analysis & Processing" was selected due to the variety of data types available and the potential for performing detailed financial analysis. The custom label "Stock Market Analysis" was chosen to reflect the server's specialized focus on stock market data and tools.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Tushare_Finance_Data
server_info_crawled.author: @guangxiangdebizi/FinanceMCP
server_info_crawled.overview:
Provide real-time financial data access including stock prices, market indices, and financial news through Tushare API integration. Enable language models to perform insightful market analysis and predictions using up-to-date financial information. Easily configure and extend the server to support additional financial data tools and workflows.

My MCP homepage：https://github.com/guangxiangdebizi/FinanceMCP

tools.name: current_timestamp
tools.description: Deploy Server Tushare_Finance_Data @guangxiangdebizi/FinanceMCP Try in Playground current_timestamp

tools.name: finance_news
tools.description: 通过真正的搜索API获取主流财经媒体的新闻内容，支持单个或多个关键词智能搜索

tools.name: stock_data
tools.description: 获取指定股票的历史行情数据，支持A股、美股、港股、外汇、期货、基金、债券逆回购、可转债、期权

tools.name: index_data
tools.description: 获取指定股票指数的数据，例如上证指数、深证成指等

tools.name: macro_econ
tools.description: 获取宏观经济数据，包括Shibor利率、LPR利率、GDP、CPI、PPI、货币供应量、PMI、社融数据、Shibor报价、Libor、Hibor等

tools.name: company_performance
tools.description: 获取上市公司综合表现数据，包括业绩预告、业绩快报、财务指标、分红送股、主营业务构成、股东变动数据、管理层信息、公司基本信息、资产负债表、现金流量表、利润表等完整财务报表数据

tools.name: fund_data
tools.description: 获取公募基金全面数据，包括基金列表、基金经理、基金净值、基金分红、基金持仓等数据。

tools.name: fund_manager_by_name
tools.description: 根据基金经理姓名查询基金经理详细信息，包括管理的基金列表、个人背景、任职经历等

tools.name: convertible_bond
tools.description: 获取可转债非行情数据，支持两种查询方式：1)使用issue类型按时间范围查询可转债发行数据；2)使用info类型按代码查询可转债详细信息

tools.name: block_trade
tools.description: 获取大宗交易数据，包括成交价格、成交量、买卖双方营业部等详细信息

tools.name: money_flow
tools.description: 获取个股和大盘资金流向数据，包括主力资金、超大单、大单、中单、小单的净流入净额和净占比数据

tools.name: margin_trade
tools.description: 获取融资融券相关数据，支持多种数据类型：标的股票、交易汇总、交易明细、转融券汇总等

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@guangxiangdebizi/FinanceMCP/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
